name: Starlight Fantasy (Pre-Alpha)
description:
Welcome to the pre-alpha version of Starlight Fantasy!

Try to get as far as possible in the dungeon by battling in turn based tactic battles, leveling up your classes and becoming stronger. This is a proof of concept build, there's a lot of things that will be added as time passes, so make sure to check back often to see how the game has changed, and please let me know all of your thoughts and things you'd like to see added in the future.

To keep up to date with the game's development, check the Official Blog and join the Discord server.
